nodes.text: Eixes Valorum was a member of the Valorum family of Coruscant. He eventually became a senator and later served as Supreme Chancellor, some time prior to 62 BBY. His Chancellorship was first proposed at one of the annual elite gatherings on the Sojourn moon hosted by Caar Damask, and was known for a sense of style not seen again until the chancellorship of Thoris Darus.
He was the last Supreme Chancellor to give a State of the Republic address prior to Palpatine.
In Labyrinth of Evil, he is named as Valorum Eixes. This is likely an editing mistake, as nowhere else is the family name given first. He is referred to as Eixes Valorum in Darth Plagueis.
